name: Guitar Hero III: Legends of Rock
name_original: Guitar Hero III: Legends of Rock
description:
Guitar Hero III: Legends of Rock is an arcade game developed by Aspyr Media, Vicarious Visions and Neversoft Entertainment. It came out on 28-10-2007. It was published by Aspyr. On review aggregator Metacritic, Guitar Hero III: Legends of Rock has a score of 82. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play Guitar Hero III: Legends of Rock on PC, macOS, Wii and Xbox 360. You can purchase the game on Nintendo eShop.
